titles.title: To express the sense of Congress with respect to enabling Food and Drug Administration scientific engagement.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services
Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary: 5/19/2015--Introduced. This bill expresses the sense of Congress that participation in or sponsorship of scientific conferences and meetings is essential to the mission of the Food and Drug Administration.
